programme.title: Vista of China (Sr.17) - EP 75
programme.desc: Through the program, explore the different development and new features of the Chinese nation from different perspectives, and understand Chinese culture in ancient and modern China and abroad.

programme.title: Sky is the Limit, The - EP 18
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mothers pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 23
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONGs simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNGs dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chungs International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 24
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONGs simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNGs dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chungs International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 31
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 32
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis. His marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: A bad-tempered, womanizing cop who always neglects his wife is shot in the head as he hunts down a drug dealer. Though he miraculously survives, he must depend on his wife to nurse him back to health. During the recovery, he begins to re-evaluate his life and repair the damages of his broken marriage.

programme.title: Behind the Yellow Line
programme.desc: A fresh graduate, Paul, strikes up an acquaintance with a pretty young girl, Monica, on the metro. Monica is involved in a love affair with a married man while Paul is also pursued by a rich girl. When Paul vows his true love for Monica, she suggests playing hide-and-seek with him in the metro to decide if they are fated to be together.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the "Gang of Five" in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: My School Mate, The Barbarian
programme.desc: Edward attends a new school which has a reputation for fighting. Student leader Stone, befriends Edward, but their friendship is tested when a local triad leader discovers that Edward comes from a wealthy family.

programme.title: Law Or Justice
programme.desc: Lawyer Yip defends a rapist and gets him acquitted. Yip's boyfriend Fong, a police inspector, knows he is guilty and despises Yip for not upholding justice. The victim's sister takes revenge by spiking the rapist's drink but is raped instead. This puts the rapist back in court. Will Yip choose to uphold law or justice this time?

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: Ming is transferred to do menial police work ten months after the murder of Yan, in 2004. Meanwhile, a new star, Wing, has emerged in the police force and Ming suspects he is also a mole sent by the triad. Determined to start anew, Ming must kill Wing while ensuring his own identity does not get exposed.

programme.title: In Laws, Out Laws
programme.desc: When priceless antiques were found in the backyard of Auntie Kang's home, the family finds themselves becoming sudden millionaires. Their arguments and disagreements lead to hilarious results as each of Auntie Kang's sons tries his darnedest to get the biggest shares!

programme.title: The Conman 2002
programme.desc: Li Ka Shing has lived his entire life as a luckless guy, until he is advised by a master to move his ancestral tomb so as to change his luck. From that day onwards, Li wins at every game in the casino. When his rival uncovers the secret, he destroys Li's ancestral tomb to gain the upper hand. Will Li win the finals of the gambling competition?

programme.title: Let's Have a Baby
programme.desc: De Sheng and Wan Jun have been married for years, but are unable to conceive. Wan Jun decides to undergo artificial insemination in the States and finally gets pregnant. She meets her cousin from the States who stays temporarily in their house with them, and De Sheng begins to suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Women
programme.desc: Bo Yi's husband is having an affair, so Bo Yi divorces him and joins the "Happy Spinsters Club" set up by her friends. However, she soon finds out that she does not enjoy being single and while sorting out her thoughts, her repentant husband begs her forgiveness. She must now decide on what she truly wants.

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Executive produced by Wong Kar Wai, "The Eagle Shooting Heroes" is loosely based on Louis Cha's classics. Whilst mistaken identity and rampant gender confusion are on the menu, Sammo Hung's action direction and the incredible all-star casts also keep the laughs and thrills coming in this Hong Kong-style crazy comedy.

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Two private detectives want to gain fame by solving a series of robberies. However, they were fooled by the King of Thieves during the investigation. It was later discovered that all the robberies were related to a Japanese businessman, Miyamoto. Who is the real King of Thieves?

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: This movie is Wong Kar Wai's most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses having an affair with each other.

programme.title: Sex Beyond The Grave
programme.desc: During World War II, a singer was raped and killed by Master Tao during her escape, with all her valuables stolen as well. Since then, the Tao's house became haunted. Years later, Master Tao's descendant sells the house to a young couple to pay off a massive gambling debt, but the couple soon discover that it is haunted by the vengeful spirit...

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Maybe It's Love
programme.desc: A girl Marble witnesses a murder case and reports it to the police. After much investigation, the police can only sort out the complicated relationships between a rich merchant's mistress, a postman, a shop owner and his wife, but find no clue as to who the murderer is. Therefore, Marble decides to carry out her own investigation...

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh II
programme.desc: Bodyguard Ah Sun is sent to protect his boss' son, only to meet and fall in love with his mistress, the gorgeous Joey. As love blossoms between the two, the powerful boss finds out and all hell breaks loose!

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack...

programme.title: Don't Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A cop has the ability to see ghosts, which is something that has been passed down from generation to generation in his family. He must learn how to manage this gift when he is confronted by the ghost of a notorious criminal whom he has shot.

programme.title: Heart of Dragon
programme.desc: A cop, Tat, forsakes his dream of becoming a sailor to take care of his mentally disabled brother, Danny. When Danny steals from a gangster by accident and gets kidnapped, Tat must turn over a key police witness in order to save him. Left with no choice, Tat has to abduct the witness and fight the gangsters until he gets Danny back.

programme.title: Seven Swords
programme.desc: Seven warriors of exceptional swordsmanship band together to protect a village from an evil general in this exciting martial arts film.

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: The Truth
programme.desc: Orphaned lawyer Raymond Lau once helped clear hooker Lan of murder charges, not knowing that Lan is his mother. When a corrupt cop blackmails Lan with Raymond's identity, she kills him out of desperation. When Raymond is enlisted again to defend Lan, he uncovers the secret that she has been hiding about their relationship for years.

programme.title: Bullet and Brain
programme.desc: Nine years ago, two legendary criminals, Bullet and Brain, vowed not to kill and lie before they disappeared. Both now return for a mission - to protect the granddaughter of the triad boss. Can they succeed without breaking their vows?

programme.title: Cherie
programme.desc: Cherie Chung plays the title character in this sexy romance as a fitness instructor who attracts the attentions of a wealthy businessman and a handsome photographer.

programme.title: Dry Wood Fierce Fire
programme.desc: Alice works for a women's magazine and falls for Ryan, who is hired to run the men's magazine, both owned by magazine tycoon Michelle. Ryan only has eyes for Michelle and Alice tries to hide her true feelings to help him win Michelle.

programme.title: Fangs of the Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Chang's. On the Chang's farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: Long Road to Gallantry
programme.desc: Tu Meng Fei makes his way to the world after completing his kung fu training. En route, he rescues Mu Wan Erh and Li San Nan from a band of thugs and later learnt of a 20-year conflict between the evil Thunder Gang Chief Leng Tian Lei and the Dragon Sect. Mu's lost father is none other than the Thunder Gang Chief, who also killed Li's father...

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Li Xun Huan is a sentimental swordsman who has lived peacefully outside the martial arts world for the past ten years. He returns home after knowing that the Plum Blossom Bandit is back to his old tricks, only to find that everything has changed.

programme.title: The Trail of the Broken Blade
programme.desc: Chivalrous swordsman Fung goes in search of another swordsman on the run, Li Yue, in order to reunite him with his love. Though both men meet and end up being close friends, Li Yue did not reveal his true identity until Fung's life is endangered by a gang looking for revenge...

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Hui's husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and causes her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: Constable Wen Chao Fan and his father are framed for a jewel robbery they did not commit. On the run from the law and becoming a wanted fugitive, Wen must recover the jewels in order to clear his family name, but unfortunately he is not the only one seeking the stolen jewels...

programme.title: Till the End of Time
programme.desc: This is Jenny Hu's stunning debut as a struggling singer who tries to keep her career and marriage intact. This movie also includes seven memorable hit songs.

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the "Tsai Li Fu" style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: A Place to Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: Illicit Desire
programme.desc: This instant cult classic adapts three erotic and mystical tales from the Chinese classical works, with stories spanning across time from the Tang to Ming dynasties. The stories, filled with characters such as emperors, concubines, monks and fortune-tellers, intertwine in a world of adultery, lust and greed, alongside great costumes!

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriend's baby...

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Martial arts student Yen returns from school to defend his family homestead against Japanese financiers after his father is killed. On the way, he meets Hua and falls in love with her. However, Hua discovers that her father is plotting with the Japanese to take Yen's property and wants to murder him. It is a tough choice between family and love...

programme.title: Na Cha the Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend "Investiture of the Gods", this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: In this classic romantic melodrama, nightclub songstress Qing Qing falls for the handsome Peng Nan. However, the two go through an emotional roller coaster of misunderstandings, separations and mutual torment. When the two finally fall back into love, Qing Qing receives a shocking revelation that brings the story to its inevitable sad ending.

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Li's new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: The legendary hero Wu Sung is sent to a prison in Meng province after murdering his adulterous sister-in-law and her lover. While in prison, the officer Shih En spares Wu the humiliating baton punishment. Owing Shih a favour, Wu decides to help Shih get his restaurant back at all costs when it was forcefully taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, they are kept apart as she is engaged to another man. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: The Swordmates
programme.desc: Li asks his swordmate Wang to protect his family while he is away, but Wang rapes his wife and even has his convoy attacked. Li escaped but fears his daughter is still in danger, so he asks the nephew of his master to help protect her...

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sister's wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: Descendant of the Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: Life is A Long Quiet River - EP 13
programme.desc: The story centers Feng Xiaoqin and Gu Qingyu, two sisters-in-law who work through their differences and grow closer in life. Faced with strong pursuit from Zhao Xiang and the reappearance of her childhood sweet heart Shi Yuan, Qingyu is entangled.

programme.title: Time Concert 2024 - EP 3
programme.desc: After 20 years, the Girls are back on stage! "Time Concert 2024" revives nostalgic melodies, celebrating two decades of music with a dazzling showcase and a competition for the top hits of the era!

programme.title: Road Home - EP 19
programme.desc: This drama tells the story of an investment director Gui Xiao (Tan Song Yun) who reunites with his first love who is now a bomb tech police officer Lu Yan Chen (Jing Bo Ran) after ten years. The two of them hit it off and find their way back to loyalty and faith.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go - EP 146
